mapper.sql: a.id, a.name, a.title, a.remarks, a.create_by as "createBy.id", a.create_date , a.update_by as "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.ename, a.type, a.data_scope as dataScope, a.useable
left join sys_user su1 on su.id = a.create_by left join sys_user su2 on su.id = a.update_by
mapper.select:
SELECT , su1.name as "createBy.name", su2.name as "updateBy.name" FROM sys_role a
WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_role( id, name, title, remark, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, ename, type, data_scope, useable ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{title}, #{remark}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{ename}, #{type}, #{dataScope}, #{useable} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_role SET name = #{name}, title = #{title}, remark = #{remark}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, ename = #{ename}, type = #{type}, data_scope = #{dataScope}, useable = #{useable} WHERE id = #{id}
